        public ScoutMapper(org.sql2o.Sql2o sql2o)

        Parameters:
        sql2o - the Sql2o database object

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public void validate()
              throws org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                     InvalidDataException,
                     NoJsonToParseException,
                     DuplicateRecordException
        Checks that Json data is valid and can be mapped
        Specified by:
        validate in class UserMapper
        Throws:
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown by database error
        InvalidDataException - thrown if json is malformed
        NoJsonToParseException - thrown if object constructed without data
        DuplicateRecordException - thrown if email is already in the database

      • validateRequirements

        public int[] validateRequirements(DatabaseSearcher lookup,
                                  com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonReqArray)
                           throws InvalidDataException,
                                  org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                                  NoRecordFoundException
        Validates that JsonArray contains valid requirements and return array of ids from database
        Parameters:
        lookup - Database searcher
        jsonReqArray - json array of requirement objects
        Returns:
        list of requirement ids
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - thrown if too many requirements passed
        NoRecordFoundException - thrown if no record of requirements are found
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown if database error occurs

      • validateNewRequirement

        public int validateNewRequirement(DatabaseSearcher lookup,
                                  int scoutID,
                                  java.lang.String reqName,
                                  java.lang.String reqRankName)
                           throws InvalidDataException,
                                  org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                                  NoRecordFoundException
        Check that requirement is valid and in database
        Parameters:
        lookup - database searcher object
        scoutID - id of the scout
        reqName - name of requirement
        reqRankName - name of requirement's rank
        Returns:
        id of requirement in database
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - thrown if requirement is not valid
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown if database error
        NoRecordFoundException - thrown if requirement not found in database.

      • validateMeritbadges

        public int[] validateMeritbadges(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonMB)

                                 org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                                 NoRecordFoundException
        Validates a JsonArray of meritbadge names and returns any array of their ids
        Parameters:
        jsonMB - JsonArray of meritbadge names
        Returns:
        array of meritbadge ids
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - thrown if json fails to validate
        NoRecordFoundException - thrown if meritbadge name not found in database
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown if database error

      • getScout

        public Scout getScout()
               throws ScoutTrackNotValidatedException,
                      org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                      InvalidDatabaseOperation
        Constructs new scout from json data and stores it in the database
        Returns:
        the new scout object
        Throws:
        ScoutTrackNotValidatedException - thrown if mapping was not validated or failed to validate.
        InvalidDatabaseOperation - thrown if invalid operation is performed on database
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown by database error
